**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 46 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 43 [The Misbegotten Troll](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2349) **Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 437 **Perception** +31; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +35, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +35 **Str** +9 **Dex** +4 **Con** +8 **Int** +0 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +6 **Items** chain of lovelies, _[+2 greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=380) [glaive](/Weapons.aspx?ID=20)_, _[+2 greater resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=147) [full plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=13)_ --- **AC** 40 **Fort** +36 **Ref** +27 **Will** +27 **HP** 430 , regeneration 45 (deactivated by acid or fire) **Weaknesses** fire 20 **[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)**
**Vigorous Shake** **Trigger** The troll king takes persistent acid or fire damage. **Effect** The troll king shakes itself to remove persistent acid or fire effects. The troll king immediately attempts a DC 15 flat check to end the persistent damage that triggered this reaction. If the troll king succeeds at this check, it can immediately use Primordial Roar as part of this reaction. --- **Speed** 30 feet **Melee** _glaive_ +35 ([deadly d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d8+17 slashing plus 3d8 piercing **Melee** jaws +35 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d12+23 piercing **Melee** claw +35 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d8+23 slashing **Forced Regeneration** ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) **Requirements** The troll king's regeneration is not currently deactivated. **Effect** The troll king regains 25 HP. **Jangle the Chain** ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) The Misbegotten Troll shakes his chain of caged sprites, causing the supernatural cages to amplify their despair. All creatures other than the Misbegotten Troll or his smilodon pets within 30 feet must attempt a DC 40 Will save. The Misbegotten Troll can't Jangle the Chain again for 1d4 rounds.
**Critical Success** The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune to Jangle the Chain for 24 hours.
**Success** The creature is [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) 1 by despair.
**Failure** The creature is [stunned](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) 1 by sadness, and then sickened 1 by despair once the stun effect ends.
**Critical Failure** The creature is stunned 3 by sadness, and then sickened 2 by despair once the stun effect ends. **Primordial Roar** ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) The troll king unleashes a bestial roar. Each non-troll creature within 100 feet must attempt a DC 40 Will save. The creature is then temporarily immune for 10 minutes.
**Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature is [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) 1.
**Failure** The creature is frightened 2.
**Critical Failure** The creature is frightened 3.
This ability doesn't affect his pet black smilodons. **[Rend](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=30)** claw **Unstoppable Charge** The troll king Strides twice in a straight line. It can make up to two claw Strikes during this movement and one jaws Strike at the end of its movement. It can't Strike the same creature more than once. **Vicious Ranseur** When the Misbegotten Troll attacks with his glaive, it manifests dozens of hooks and spikes along its length and blade. He deals an additional 3d8 piercing damage to any creature he strikes but inflicts 1d8 piercing damage to himself with each glaive Strike.
name: The Misbegotten Troll
